channel.title: Muse Community Moderators on Muse
channel.description: Recent content in Muse Community Moderators on Muse

item.title: State of the Community 02/2024
item.description: A thank-you to all our amazing musical contributors as we head into the Spring season! Last month, we broke our all-time record for user contributions, with over 3,000 new albums, EPs, and singles documented on Muse. Congratulations to the winners of the January Top Contributer award: SkiiBaller and LongNamesAreWack, who will be receiving six months of Muse Pro free of charge.
